item.description:
Gourab Ghosh Roy has started his joint PhD at University of Birmingham and University of Melbourne in 2018. He is working on interplay of structure and dynamics for better understanding of networks with special focus on biological networks.

His research interests also include machine learning, computer vision and optimization algorithms. He completed two Masters at The Ohio State University and Erasmus Mundus VIBOT program. He has also worked as a software engineer in data processing for 2 years.
